body_content.explanation: someone who goes around a public place picking up litter (= small pieces of rubbish) from the ground:
examples: 150 litter pickers will be employed to clear the site on the Monday after the race weekend.
She earned money as a litter-picker at the Glastonbury Festival.

body_content.explanation: a device like a long stick with two parts on the end that can be opened and pressed together using a handle at the top of the stick, in order to pick up small pieces of rubbish from the ground, or a stick with a point on the end that can be used to do this:
examples: Bin bags and litter pickers will be provided.
I grab a litter picker and start reaching for far-flung sweet wrappers.
